What is typically the difference between glass and crystal?

Glass is actually crystal in its rawest style. When lead is included in glass it becomes ravenscroft.

So crystal is glass that's been leaded. It is done 1) to include weight, 2) to add brilliance to your glass, and 3) the live makes the crystal softer therefore much better to cut.

So essentially crystal beads will likely be heavier, brighter, and precision cut for sparkle quite simply crystal is sturdier and also prettier than plain a glass.

How many types of crystal beads are available?

There are as many types of crystal beads as you can find glass beads. Swarovski is a brand of high grade crystal which means their beads are more expensive for their quality and added stand out. The Swarovski Crystal clear company was started just by Daniel Swarovski in 1895. He was the son associated with a glass cutter. He invented the very first electric machine for decreasing glass into crystal. This also gave http://www.wholesaleswarovskibeads.com/ a notoriety.

Swarovski is just a brandname name of Austrian crystal but as Swarovski was seen to get superior to other Austrian amazingly their name was useful for advertising purposes to allow the buyer know they were getting the highest quality available.

Because Swarovski crystal will be machine-cut it gives each http://www.wholesaleswarovskibeads.com/ a wholly uniform appearance and specifications.
